attributes.action: Allow single women IVF treatment on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Single professional women who have put their careers first are unable to receive IVF treatment (with donor sperm) on the NHS. 

If it is afforded to hetrosexual and lesbian couples, why are single women discriminated against and not considered for such treatments.

It is UNFAIR to deny decent hard working women the same medical treatments as Lesbian women and Hetrosexual couples.  

Single women, like men and lesbians pay their National Insurance Contributions and should be entitled to the same medical care.
